scripts.babel: mkdirp build && babel basylbinder.js -o build/basylbinder-es5.min.js && minify build/basylbinder-es5.min.js -o build/basylbinder-es5.min.js && minify basylbinder.js -o build/basylbinder.min.js && file-merge -i **/ajslicense.txt,**/build/basylbinder.min.js -o build/basylbinder.min.js && file-merge -i **/ajslicense.txt,**/build/basylbinder-es5.min.js -o build/basylbinder-es5.min.js
